title: Humanizer user guide
content:
The Humanizer agent is like your editor with emotional intelligence, fine-tuning your AI-generated writing to sound more natural, sincere, and distinctly human. It helps you eliminate robotic phrasing, add warmth or nuance, and ensure your voice feels authentic to your audience, whether you're writing an email, a proposal, or a blog post.
How to use
To change the voice of your text, click the Humanizer agent icon on the agents tab on the right side:
You can add your own voice or choose one of the available options:
To create a voice, click
Create a voice
, add a name to your voice, and add your writing sample of 200 words or less as a style reference.
The Humanizer tab displays detailed suggestions for improvement within your text. Hover over the bars on the left side of your text to see actionable feedback prompts that guide you on how to update the text in line with your preference:
